title: The Twilight Saga
description: This stunning set, complete with all four hardcover books as well as four collectible prints, makes the perfect gift for fans of the bestselling vampire love story.Deeply romantic and extraordinarily suspenseful, Twilight, New Moon, Eclipse, and Breaking Dawn capture the struggle between defying our instincts and satisfying our desires.Set contains the 1st Edition printings by Little Brown and Company:* Twilight (ISBN: 0316160172 / ISBN13: 9780316160179)* New Moon (ISBN: 0316160199 / ISBN13: 9780316160193)* Eclipse (ISBN: 0316160202 / ISBN13: 9780316160209)* Breaking Dawn (ISBN: 031606792X / ISBN13: 9780316067928)
author: Stephenie Meyer
